text: Hey guys, it’s Ro!

I’ve been getting a lot of questions from
you guys about the pictures I’ve been posting on

Instagram, Tumblr, Twitter and Facebook. So,
I thought I would make an update video

to let you guys know what’s going on so
we can all get on the same page!

The 1st update is that I am announcing my
first original song and music video

called Perfect Together! I made the song with
my good friend Kurt Hugo Schneider.

You guys know Kurt, he’s been on a bunch
of Nerdy Nummies episodes, and I’ve

been in a bunch of his stuff, he’s playing
guitar, and I’m singing, and we made

this really sweet, simple love song with food
pairings, ‘cuz you know me, I love food!

So the song comes out on February 14th, which
is Valentines Day, because it is a love

song, so I thought let’s be really corny
with it! Let’s release it on Valentines Day!

It’s being edited right now, and I when
I was thinking of ideas for the Music Video,

I wanted it to be very romantic, and 1 of
my favorite movies of all time is

Beauty and the Beast, I just love that big
French Ballroom when they’re ballroom

dancing, so I called my dear friend Greg Aronowitz,
he’s super talented, he

directed and produced the music video. He’s
worked on over 300 films and television
shows, he knows what he’s doing!

So he was able to take my big idea and actually
bring it to life.

I may have gone a little bit overboard, I
really wanted it to feel like a ballroom,

17-1800 French style ballroom, so we had
amazing hair and makeup team, I got like

20 Marie Antoinette, French Victorian style
dresses, and we just made magic!

I have a lot of YouTube friends who have some
guest appearances in the video, so see if
you can spot them.

We’ve got Warp Zone, Felicia Day, Kurt Hugo
Schneider, Husky Starcraft, Cassey Ho from

Blogilaties, Jen, Frmheadtotoe, Captain Sparklez,
Jimmy Wong and Abbe Drake, iJustine

and Jake from Vsauce 3! Plus my sister Mo’s
in it, so see if you can spot her,
it’s like, pretty fun!

I had so much fun recording the video with
kurt and filming with all of my friends

and Greg’s team, this video is just so special
to me, because it was made with everyone
I love and I really hope you guys enjoy it!

The countdown starts today, it comes out in
7 days...  Pretty cool!

Moving on to the next update, which also happens
to be music related, I uploaded an

opera audition that I sang from awhile ago,
it’s on sound cloud, and I just wanted to

thank you guys for going there and checking
it out and being so supportive.

I know that opera is not everybody’s cup
of tea, but, I love opera.

I’m 1/4 Italian, so maybe it’s like, that
side of me, just loves opera!

The song I sang was “O Mio Babbino” and
it was just so special, and I just wanted

to say thank you, it was very fun, I’ll
put a link down below so that if you missed

it and you want to check out some opera, it’s
down there! You can go check it out!

The next update, is you probably saw some
pictures on Instagram and stuff, that

Rhett & Link invited me to be a guest on Good
Mythical Morning! It was so much fun,

we played the Sugar Free Taste Test, and I
don’t know how this happened, spoiler!

But we had a 3 way tie, that was not planned,
that was totally genuine, it

was really awesome! So I’ll put that link
down below.

I was also on more episodes of YouTuber’s
React, I’ll put the links down below so
you can check those out too!

Last update is about my new puppy Cookie!
I’ve been getting a lot of questions from

you guys asking how she’s doing and she’s
doing great!

She just got her final round of shots, we
have been socializing her more, taking

her out on walks, meeting dogs, people, she
even went to the beach for her 1st time.

And, she can now walk up all the stairs on
her own. She can’t come down the stairs yet.

But, she’s learning commands and tricks like
sit, the really basic ones.

And the cutest thing is that her and my sister’s
dog Henry are really getting along.

It’s like the most adorable thing ever,
they play together all day, and they cuddle

and sleep together, and they’re really like
brother-sister.
It’s pretty cute!

Thanks for watching the update video you guys!
I’ll be posting more updates and behind

the scenes pictures for Perfect Together on
my Instagram, Tumblr, Facebook and Twitter,
and some more pictures of Cookie!

And, countdown starts now! Music video comes
out in 7 days!
Whoa that kind of sounds like a horror film!
7 DAYS!
Also look who’s sleeping on me! Awwwww!
Bye-bye! Mwah!
